bill.summary:
Disclosing Pharmaceutical Company Windfall Profits Act of 2018
This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require pharmaceutical companies to make certain public disclosures, including disclosures related to taxation, compensation, dividends, and spending on research and development.
